title: Steamboat Willie
creator_credit: Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Steamboat Willie is the first animated film to use synchronised sound, and the first Mickey Mouse cartoon ever released. Mickey appears as a crew member on a riverboat which is captained by big bad Pete. Minnie Mouse is the passenger who joins Mickey as he uses various props as musical instruments. Animation by Ub Iwerks.
